name: WP Highlight Box
author: Shopcode

sections.description: Create Highlight Box content for wordpress with Wp Highlight Box Plugin support Shortcode with tinymce, easy using
sections.installation:
1.Install plugin from WordPress menu Plugins > Add New
2.Activate the plugin
3.Well done.
4.using:
[highlight-box class=”wp-highlight-box-blue” style=”background:#000000;color:#000000″ content=”Your content here”]

Green:

[highlight-box class=”wp-highlight-box-green” style=”background:#000000;color:#000000″ content=”Your content here”]

Red:

[highlight-box class=”wp-highlight-box-red” style=”background:#000000;color:#000000″ content=”Your content here”]

Custome:

[highlight-box class=”wp-highlight-box” style=”background:#a82323;color:#f2eded” content=”Your content here”]
